Soon, Sketchware will display ads in a few places (like banners).

🔹 Ads will be unobtrusive and won’t interfere with usability.
🔹 100% of the revenue will be reinvested into Sketchware to ensure continuous improvements.

🚀 Key highlights coming soon:

⭐ Full AI integration to assist development.

⭐ MSQL integration.

⭐ Support for multiple ad providers (better performance and more options).

⭐ In‑app payments system.

⭐ Project versioning with GitHub directly in Sketchware.

⭐ New component manager with modern libraries.

⭐ Performance improvements and refreshed UI.

⭐ More templates and ready‑made examples to accelerate projects.

⭐ Ongoing updates with community‑driven features.

✨ Our goal is to make Sketchware even more powerful, modern, and accessible for everyone.

Thank you for supporting the development! 🙏
